## pipe variable

Pipe SDK client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pipe: (client: APIClient) => {
    rooms: {
        getAll(project?: Id<'project'>): Promise<(Room & {
            delete(): Promise<void>;
        })[]>;
        create(name: string, options: {
            deliveryProtocols: DeliveryProtocol[];
            ephemeral?: boolean;
            ingestProtocol: 'rtmp' | 'rtp';
            hlsConfig?: {
                wcl_delay: number;
                artificial_delay: number;
                max_playout_bitrate_preset: string;
            };
        }): Promise<Room & {
            delete(): Promise<void>;
        }>;
        delete(room: Id<'pipe_room'>): Promise<void>;
    };
}
```
